44 class IKNode: public Object, public Identifiable {
45 public:
46 
47  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
50 
51  enum NodeType {
52  kEndEffector = (1 << 0), // End of a chain
53  kSubBase = (1 << 1), // Intermediate meeting of two or more chains
54  kRoot = (1 << 2) // The root of the chain
55  };
56  typedef QFlags<NodeType> NodeTypeFlags;
57 
59 
60  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
63 
64  IKNode();
65  IKNode(IKChain* chain);
66  IKNode(IKChain* chain, const SkeletonJoint& meshNode);
67  virtual ~IKNode();
68 
70 
71  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
74 
75  bool isRoot() const {
76  return m_flags.testFlag(kRoot);
77  }
78  bool isSubBase() const {
79  return m_flags.testFlag(kSubBase);
80  }
81  bool isEndEffector() const {
82  return m_flags.testFlag(kEndEffector);
83  }
84 
86  IKNode* addChild(const SkeletonJoint& child);
87

90  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
